players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "Alice was killed, so she was town. Diana or Bob is mafia. Let's discuss."
Diana: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafia. We must vote him out today."
Charlie: "I trust Diana's investigation. Bob is mafia. Let's vote him out."
You: "I am not the mafia, Diana is lying to save herself. Why would she accuse me without proof? Diana and Charlie are trying to frame me to cover their tracks."
Diana: "I have proof Bob is mafia from my investigation. He's deflecting because he has no defense. Vote Bob to win."
